lines.text: Ladies! Let's not get vulgar, yet.
What of it? This is a festive occasion.
Well, don't smoke too many, or you might get The Ding.
But my husband has will power!
Yes. Mr Davies has great will power!
Don't worry. I'm not gonna shoot the main line if I know what I'm doing!
Mmm. The bees and the honey!
Too much talk about large sums of money.
Say, do you know what in means to get The Ding?
Are you telling me I don't know how to handle my Sweet Marguerite?
Uh oh. I told you she'd get the ding!
Where'd you get the rags, kiddie? Wearing that, you look like the devil's concubine.
The doctor put up for this.
Oh, I thought I saw him coming from the ten cent store this afternoon.
If you'd looked any closer, you'd have seen it was only your reflection in the window.
Say, Lena, you usually take speed, don't you?
You can shoot me up I don't... with a needle.
